messages.subject: Unschooling Books, was Just finished Dayna Martin's new book
messages.msgSnippet: ... insxpensive. It is in a very readable. Question and answer format. It is  the book I always recommend to friends to read when discovering unschooling. ...
messages.messageBody:
>>>I really love Rue Kream's book, Raising A Free Child. It is
insxpensive. It is in a very readable. Question and answer format. It
is the book I always recommend to friends to read when discovering
unschooling.

> > I received Dayna Martin's new book in the mail yesterday and
> finished it this evening, it is fantastic! It was honest,
> straightforward and connected with what I have been trying to do/
> change regarding my parenting these past few months.<<<<

Just a reminder that BOTH Dayna and Rue (and lots of other cool people!)
will be at the Northeast Unschooling Conference in August! Check out the
website for more information.

Kathryn Baptista, Conference Goddess
_http://northeastunschoolingconference.com/_
(http://northeastunschoolingconference.com/)
